amendatorysection.catchline: Parolee; violation of parole; action of Board of Parole.
amendatorysection.para: (1) If the board finds that the parolee has engaged in criminal conduct, used drugs or alcohol, or refused to submit to a drug or alcohol test while on parole, the board may order revocation of the parolee's parole.
(2) If the board finds that the parolee did violate a condition of parole but is of the opinion that revocation of parole is not appropriate, the board may order that:
(a) The parolee receive a reprimand and warning;
(b) Parole supervision and reporting be intensified;
(c) Good time granted pursuant to section 83-1,108 be forfeited or withheld; or
(d) The parolee be required to conform to one or more additional conditions of parole which may be imposed in accordance with the Nebraska Treatment and Corrections Act.
